attributes.action: allow Tul Bahadur Pun 84 , a vetran Gurkha who won the V.C for single-handedly storming Japanese machine gun posts to come to this country to recieve the medical care he urgently needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He has a days walk to pick his medication up despite suffering from heart problems, asthma, diabetes and high blood pressure all which require daily medication and which are not always avaliable in nepal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
